name: chrono_hacker
description:
A tiny little cool unstable game!

Our hero needs access to servers in the distant past to get access to an encrypted file! So the hero flies back in time to get access, but the data needed is scattered across multiple servers, requiring multiple trips!

The hero needs to avoid getting touched by their past selves, otherwise it will introduce too much temporal instability!

Too much instability (>200 instability!) will corrupt the timelines too much and result in game over!
